Posts.Content: Hiya, this is just awful for you Are you in the position to pay for a private mammogram?! I know it’s crazy to even have to think about this as an option but for your own peace of mind and sanity.  I went to my GP with a weird sensation in my nipple that’s been present for around 7/8wks. She examined me and found a lump and I got a urgent cancer referral. Appt next Tuesday (15/5/18) oddly I can’t actually feel any lump, my boobs actually feel like a bag of peas TBH, very lumpy. I’m grateful the dr is being cautious but boy my head is going overtime to the point I can’t sleep and I’m googling like it’s going out of fashion Really hope you’re seen asap. Sending positive thoughts and hugs your way xxxxxx
Posts.Title: Pain in my left breast - consultant not interested
